name: CyberMonkeys
description:
Web version lags a bit. Best to download.

I have encountered problems building Windows and MacOS. I'll have to look into it and link working builds (sadly) after submission closure.

Only one door left between Robotguy™ and the evil Dr. Zu™ .The Maze of Ornithological riddles™ (which was shameless padding) didn't even slow down our hero.
But what is this? Who will Dr. Zu™ send now. As the doors slowly open our hero calculates with 93.87% certainty that he walked right into a trap...

Third party assets:

  • https://opengameart.org/content/handgun-reload-sound-effect
  • https://opengameart.org/content/gun-reload-sounds
  • https://opengameart.org/content/laser-rifle CC-BY-SA 3.0
  • https://www.poliigon.com/texture/metal-corrugated-iron-sheet-002
  • https://www.poliigon.com/texture/metal-panel-rectangular-001
  • https://www.poliigon.com/texture/bricks-painted-white-001

Recycled assets:

  • Monkey model (modified)
  • machine gun model
  • metal thump sound

*trademark symbols were added for comedic effect, no trademarks are filed
